resources.string: Five times world player of the year. Six Golden Boots. Eight League titles. Four Champions Leagues. 91 goals in a calender year. Get ready to meet the best football player of all time. Lionel Messi. Here at NIT Jamshedpur.

Five times world player of the year. Five Champions Leagues. Most goals and wins in the Champions League. Euro 2016 winner. He has won league titles in England, Spain and Italy. Meet him in romm NA-207.
Highly skilled. Puskas award winner. Won Olympic gold for Brazil. The PSG star will be here on Day 3. Meet him room D-403.
